meanings.definition: A building or structure designed to house multiple families.
meanings.sent1: The new multifamily in our neighborhood has three floors for different families.
meanings.sent2: We visited a beautiful multifamily with spacious apartments for each family.
meanings.sent3: The multifamily building looked like a giant puzzle of homes put together.
meanings.sent4: Living in a multifamily is like being part of a big, happy village under one roof.
meanings.sent5: The multifamily stood tall, welcoming families from all walks of life.

meanings.definition: Relating to or intended for multiple families living together.
meanings.sent1: The multifamily picnic was a fun event for all the families in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: She designed a multifamily room where everyone could gather and spend time together.
meanings.sent3: The multifamily barbecue turned into a friendly competition of grilling skills.
meanings.sent4: Their multifamily garden was a colorful patchwork of flowers and vegetables.
meanings.sent5: The multifamily community center was a hub of activities for all ages.
